mapper.select: select * from product order by product_number

SELECT count(*) FROM product p INNER JOIN category c ON p.smallcategory_name = c.smallcategory_name WHERE c.bigcategory_name = #{bigcategory_name} and (p.s_stock>0 or p.M_STOCK>0 or p.L_STOCK>0 or p.Xl_STOCK>0)

SELECT p.*, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM product p INNER JOIN category c ON p.smallcategory_name = c.smallcategory_name LEFT JOIN orderdetail o ON p.product_number = o.product_number LEFT JOIN review r ON o.orderdetail_number = r.orderdetail_number WHERE c.bigcategory_name = #{bigcategory_name} AND (p.s_stock > 0 OR p.m_stock > 0 OR p.l_stock > 0 OR p.xl_stock > 0) GROUP BY p.product_number, p.product_name, p.image, p.price, p.content, p.temperature, p.s_stock, p.m_stock, p.l_stock, p.xl_stock, p.smallcategory_name, c.bigcategory_name order by p.product_number desc
SELECT * FROM product WHERE smallcategory_name = #{smallcategory_name} and (s_stock>0 or M_STOCK>0 or L_STOCK>0 or XL_STOCK>0) order by product_number desc

SELECT p.*, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM product p INNER JOIN category c ON p.smallcategory_name = c.smallcategory_name LEFT JOIN orderdetail o ON p.product_number = o.product_number LEFT JOIN review r ON o.orderdetail_number = r.orderdetail_number WHERE p.PRODUCT_NAME like #{brand} AND (p.s_stock > 0 OR p.m_stock > 0 OR p.l_stock > 0 OR p.xl_stock > 0) GROUP BY p.product_number, p.product_name, p.image, p.price, p.content, p.temperature, p.s_stock, p.m_stock, p.l_stock, p.xl_stock, p.smallcategory_name, c.bigcategory_name order by p.product_number desc
SELECT product_name FROM product WHERE product_name LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY product_name FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM product WHERE product_name LIKE '%' || #{searchWord2} || '%' ORDER BY product_name FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.product_number,p.product_name,p.image,p.price,p.content,p.temperature, p.s_stock,p.m_stock,p.l_stock,p.xl_stock,p.smallcategory_name, COUNT(od.product_number) AS product_count,AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM product p LEFT JOIN orderdetail od ON p.product_number = od.product_number LEFT JOIN review r ON od.orderdetail_number = r.orderdetail_number GROUP BY p.product_number,p.product_name,p.image,p.price,p.content,p.temperature, p.s_stock,p.m_stock,p.l_stock,p.xl_stock,p.smallcategory_name ORDER BY product_count DESC, average_rating DESC
SELECT keyword, count FROM pop ORDER BY count DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY
